price: 4. Waxaan ognahay wuxuu dhulku ka dhimo (jidhkooda), Agtannadana waxaa yaal Kitaab wax walba kooba oo xafidan (Looxa Maxfuudka).
arabic: قَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا مَا تَنقُصُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ مِنۡهُمۡۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَٰبٌ حَفِيظُۢ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qad ʿalim'nā mā tanquṣu al-arḍu min'hum waʿindanā kitābun ḥafīẓun
